skillTree.localised_description: This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 during ambushes
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: If Night Goblins know one thing, it's that victory is victory, no matter; in fact, the sneakier the better.

effects.description: Enables Skarsnik's Death Juice attacks

related_phases.onscreen_name:
Skarsnik's Death Juice!
	Damage over time

skillTree.localised_description: A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +8 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Squig units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins are vicious little beasts with addled-brains and despicable little plans.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20% for Night Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%
Ability: "Spite of Da Bad Moon"
Ability: "Fermented Fungi"

attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

skillTree.localised_description: "It ain't really hidin, jus tac-tik-kel moving is all!"

effects.description: Speed: +15%
Physical resistance: 15%
Attribute: Stalk

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: When push comes to shove, make sure you aren't the one being pushed!

effects.description: Steal +25% of the experience earned by other Lords

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Goblin Big Boss
	(all provinces)

Unlocks Hero recruitment: Night Goblin Shaman
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: "Take it, take it all! Every las' bit of it!"

effects.description: Magic item drop chance: +30%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Skarsnik has a unique history with working in the dark, and his expertise in the matters of ambush and betrayal are legendary!

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +6 during ambushes
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 during ambushes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15
Charge bonus: +30

skillTree.localised_description: Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

effects.description: Leadership: +6
Leadership: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

effects.description: Armour: +7
Armour: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

skillTree.localised_description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

skillTree.localised_description: Ridin’ on chariots means ya can be even more fighty, an' even more killy!

skillTree.localised_description: Even bigga than a Black Orc, an' not bad at killin’ too!

skillTree.localised_description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

skillTree.localised_description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

skillTree.localised_description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Every cave and ditch is a hiding place for these Goblins - you cannot hit what you cannot see.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +15%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +45%

skillTree.localised_description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +16%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Income from looting settlements: +3%
Income from looting settlements: +8%
Income from looting settlements: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +3%
Income from sacking settlements: +8%
Income from sacking settlements: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Night Goblins are sneaky and pervasive - they creep and crawl from every hole to join in the killin'.

effects.description:
Reinforcement range: +35%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: They march because they're told to, and of course because they'll get a 'right proper thrashin'' if they don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%
Campaign movement range: +10%
Campaign movement range: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

Ambush success chance: +6%
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

items.colour_text: Skarsnik's pointed staff, pulsating with magical energy, channels the might of Gork (or Mork) to lance out with weird, terrifying power.

effects.description:
Public order: +3
	(all provinces)
Melee attack: +6
Weapon strength: +10%
Enables magical attacks
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
Ability: "Skarsnik's Prodder"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: “The Peaks belong to me. I dare yoo to try and take ‘em from me, stunty.”

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

Charge bonus: +14 for Night Goblin Squig Hoppers units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
